Subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact

::Enertron::
    He follows Galvatron unable to catch up without making himself known.  He 
comes upon a battle.  He saw the bot who smelled of evil (Galvatron) fire on 
another bot whom he recognized as Megatron (He's a hermit but not entirely 
uninformed.)  "No matter," he thought to himself, "I will have to stop him 
anyway."  He flies into the battle stopping a short distance away from 
Galvatron.  "Are you ready to die oh unholy one?  I hope so."  He raises both 
of his hands over his head accumulating energy from the air around him.  The 
energy coalesces into two large balls at the ends of each of his hands.  He 
launches both upwards into the air ground.  They stop above Galvatron and 
flatten into disks.  The disks rotate around each other over Galvatron slowly 
becoming one disk.  Enertron screams "MAY THE WRATH OF THE HEAVENS STRIKE YOU 
DOWN!!!!!"  He lowers his hands bringing a cylinder of destructive energy 
down from the disks.
